DOC.criteria: Age 18 70 year old ; Skin type : I ( light caucasian ) , II ( caucasian ) , III ( light dark ) IV ( dark ) intact skin product apply Agreement comply test procedure attend clinic day ixed time medical assessment application read dressing Signature inform consent form Pregnancy lactation Use antiinflammatory immunosuppressive drug 30 day three month prior selection ; Diseases cause immune suppression ; Personal history atopy ; History sensitisation irritability topical product ; Active cutaneous pathology ( local / scatter ) may interfere study result ; Use new drug and/or cosmetic experiment ; Skin reactivity ; Previous participation study product test ; Volunteers congenital acquire known immunodeficiency ; Relevant medical history current evidence alcohol drug abuse ; Known historical suspect intolerance ingredient product study ( product test comparator ) ; Sponsor 's employee involve study , close family member employee involve study ;
